message: Every Friday night all over the country, there will be incidents where automobiles are the chosen instrument of crime, pain and suffering. Ban happy hour, ban beer, ban cars......kind of silly. Not going to happen. In the US we have good laws but the problem is the enforcement of those laws. I think career professional politicians continue to let the public down, time and time again. Either have law or have disorder.
Prayer for all the police officers and there families
